dict.acceptation: 不公正的，不公平的；违反规则或准则的；

sent.orig: It'seems unfair because it is unfair.
sent.trans: 事情本身就是不公平的，所以听来不公平。

sent.orig: Protection of commercial secrets of Anti-Unfair Competition Law to safeguard against unfair competition right one.
sent.trans: 保护商业秘密是反不正当竞争法维护的反不正当竞争权之一。

sent.orig: Sol: Does that seem unfair to anybody?
sent.trans: 索尔：这样会不会对每个人都不太公平？

sent.orig: Wang Ping: They abused the gold medal, and made the competi-tion unfair.
sent.trans: 王平：给金牌抹了黑，比赛也变得不公平了。

sent.orig: So in a way it is unfair to complain about loose ends.
sent.trans: 因此在某种程度上抱怨存在欠缺是不公平的。
